tool.name: OTB.Quicklook
tool.description: Generates a subsampled version of an image extract
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayin False output_data_out $output_data_out name OTB.Quicklook in $in out $out cl '$cl' rox $rox roy $roy rsx $rsx rsy $rsy sr $sr sx $sx sy $sy prefer $prefer response $response outputType_out $OutputSection_out.outputType_out transmissionMode_out $OutputSection_out.transmissionMode_out

param.name: in
param.label: The image to read
param.help: The image to read The following data types are allowed in the txt file: png, jpeg, tiff

param.name: rox
param.label: first point of ROI in x-direction
param.help: first point of ROI in x-direction

param.name: roy
param.label: first point of ROI in y-direction
param.help: first point of ROI in y-direction

param.name: sx
param.label: quicklook size in x-direction (used if no sampling ration is given)
param.help: quicklook size in x-direction (used if no sampling ration is given)

param.name: sy
param.label: quicklook size in y-direction (used if no sampling ration is given)
param.help: quicklook size in y-direction (used if no sampling ration is given)

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_out
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_out
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

tool.help: Generates a subsampled version of an extract of an image defined by ROIStart and ROISize. This extract is subsampled using the ratio OR the output image Size.
